Articles.Content:
So in my first Voyager-style mission, the stock manoeuvre node system that previously hadn't been any trouble managed to drive me up the creek. It seems it really doesn't like you to place a node on a fast hyperbolic trajectory, and it's not precise enough for the super-fine corrections needed when slingshotting from planet to planet.

Hence, what mod to go for to give better control over manoeuvre nodes? Just go straight for MechJeb and be done with it, or is there something more focussed to the task?

Edited March 31, 2014 by cantab
change title
There's PreciseNode and there's MechJeb. One of them should work for you.
PreciseNode is probably the best. With MechJeb, you need the part installed, PreciseNode does it for all ships.
